articles.title: FTC sues to block $8.5bn deal between the makers of Michael Kors and Coach - Financial Times

articles.content: The Federal Trade Commission has sued to block US luxury goods group Tapestrys $8.5bn acquisition of Capri Holdings, a move that threatens a bid to create a US rival to European giants LVMH and Kerin… [+2196 chars]
